statements: CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, block_id INT, from_address VARCHAR(255), to_address VARCHAR(255), amount DECIMAL(10, 2), timestamp TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE blockchain_blocks (block_id INT PRIMARY KEY, block_hash VARCHAR(255), previous_block_hash VARCHAR(255), timestamp TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE blockchain_users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_name VARCHAR(255), balance DECIMAL(10, 2), registration_date TIMESTAMP, last_login TIMESTAMP);
